author: cbs8
title: All American Bikini Car Wash - New Movie Release - Now Available on Video on Demand
text:
All American Bikini Car Wash - Shot on location in Las Vegas with luxury cars and hot bikini girls. Sexy excapist fun speeds onto On Demand - available now on Video on Demand - new from Meridien Films and Epic Pictures Group
Los Angeles, CA (PRWEB) October 18, 2015
What happens in Vegas
Do you like fast cars and hot babes? Get ready for ALL AMERICAN BIKINI CAR WASH, a throwback to the fun sexy comedies of the 80’s. An ensemble story of a young man who has to turn a profit on an old car wash with a little help from his friends. All American Bikini Car Wash, shot entirely on location in Las Vegas with legendary exotic cars and world famous pin ups is in full throttle on VOD and available on DirecTV, Dish, Verizon, iTunes, Amazon and many more.
“It's just 90+ minutes of innocent and at the same time slightly naughty entertainment - simply put: great summer fun” – searchmytrash.com; “Purveyors of this blend of comedy will find themselves right at home” – JoBlo.com.
The film stars an excellent ensemble of young up and coming actors, Jack Cullison (Milf, Celebrity Sex Tape), Jason Lockhart (Casting Couch, Silent But Deadly), Beauty Queen Ashley Park (The Hazing, Day for Night), Playboy Playmate Kayla Collins (Entourage, I’m a Celebrity, Get Me Out of Here!), Mindy Robinson (V/H/S/2, Stretch) and Erika Jordan (Sharknado 3, The Playboy Morning Show) and some of today's adult entertainment premiere stars including Ana Foxx & Christiana Cinn!
The All American Bikini Car Wash's message is: "This is the perfect time for a fun, lighthearted comedy because we all deserve another laugh."
When hard-partying Jack learns he is failing out of college, his professor offers him a chance to save his grade by running the local car wash. But Jack takes on way more than he can handle when his friends talk him into turning the business into a sexy bikini car wash. Jack and his buddies fulfill every guy's dream - surrounded by sexy, beautiful girls washing exotic Ferraris, Lamborghinis, muscle cars and everything in between! But will Jack get the girl of his dreams? Set in world famous Las Vegas, All American Bikini Car Wash is a flick full of explosive and super sexy fun!
http://www.GoBikiniCarWash.com
Available on: DirecTV , Dish Network, Verizon On Demand, iTunes , Amazon , Vimeo , Playstation , Xbox, Charter, MediaCom, SuddenLink, FlixFling, Vudu, SlingTV, Google Play and many more
Production company: Meridien Films is focused on producing high-concept and commercial films. Meridien’s PARANORMAL ASYLUM has been a commercially successful film worldwide.
US Distributor: Epic Pictures Group is a distributor of theatrical, home video, and digital content for the North American market. Upcoming releases include Sundance selection and SXSW Audience Award winning film TURBO KID and super sexy teen comedy ALL AMERICAN BIKINI CAR WASH.
Contact: sales(at)meridienfilms(dot)com
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/10/prweb13028646.htm
